mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval_history (participation_id, action, status, order_id, error_message, created_at) VALUES (#{participationId}, #{action}, #{status}, #{orderId}, #{errorMessage}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, participation_id, action, status, order_id, error_message, created_at FROM approval_history ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, participation_id, action, status, order_id, error_message, created_at FROM approval_history WHERE participation_id = #{participationId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
